duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute business driving initiatives to attract new customers and build a loyal customer base.
Supervise and train associates on sales training and product knowledge to ensure excellent customer service and achieve sales targets.
Communicate and uphold brand philosophy, aesthetic, and standards to the sales team and customers.
Manage store operations, including opening and closing procedures, inventory management, and adherence to loss prevention policies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree preferred, with 2-3 years' experience in luxury goods or comparable retail environment
